articles.title: Patriots reportedly set to name Zak Kuhr as defensive coordinator
articles.description:
Kuhr handled the role in an unofficial capacity during the 2025 season while Terrell Williams was on leave battling cancer.

The post Patriots reportedly set to name Zak Kuhr as defensive coordinator appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Drake Maye refused to make excuses, but after rewatching the Super Bowl, it’s clear he played hurt and it affected him
articles.description:
The youngest son of a quarterback did exactly what a quarterback is supposed to do: He took one more for the team. But after rewatching the Super Bowl this week, I’m convinced Maye was hurt — and it affected him greatly.

The post Drake Maye refused to make excuses, but after rewatching the Super Bowl, it’s clear he played hurt and it affected him appeared first on Boston.com.
